headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Newmont After Its 146% Surge In 2025?
summary: If you are wondering whether Newmont is still worth considering after its big run, or if you have already missed the gold rush, this breakdown will walk you through what the market might be getting right or wrong about the stock. Newmont has been on a tear, with the share price up 5.3% over the last week, 7.0% over the past month, and a striking 146.0% year to date, building on a 127.1% gain over the last year. These moves come as investors refocus on gold as a hedge amid uncertainty in...
